channel.title: Weapons naming and binding
channel.description:
Hello folks, not sure if this is the place to post it, so feel free to move it if you think there's a better place for this contribution (make it a Sticky, maybe?).
So, I don't know about you but I really like binding weapons to specific keys so I don't have to be pressing numbers or scrolling in the middle of an encounter.
Problems: weapons names in BMS differ from HL1 and HL2; plus, the names in folder C:/Program Files/Steam/SteamApps/SourceMods/BMS/models/weapons/ also differ from those used in the game (crazy but true).
So here is my little contribution to the community:
[b]Weapons names:[/b]
[b][u]Crowbar:[/u][/b] [i]weapon_crowbar[/i] [b][u]Pistol (9mm):[/u][/b] [i]weapon_glock[/i] [b][u]SMG (9mm):[/u][/b] [i]weapon_mp5[/i] [b][u]Shotgun:[/u][/b] [i]weapon_shotgun[/i] [b][u]Hand grenade:[/u][/b] [i]weapon_frag[/i] [b][u]Missile launcher, RPG or Bazooka:[/u][/b] [i]weapon_rpg[/i] [b][u]Revolver (.357):[/u][/b] [i]weapon_357[/i] [b][u]Gauss, TauCannon, etc:[/u][/b] [i]weapon_tau[/i] [b][u]Hornet Gun, Hive Hand, etc:[/u][/b] [i]weapon_hivehand[/i] [b][u]Gluon Gun, Egon, etc:[/u][/b] [i]weapon_gluon[/i] [b][u]Slam, TripMine, etc:[/u][/b] [i]weapon_tripmine[/i] [b][u]Crossbow, xbow, etc:[/u][/b] [i]weapon_crossbow[/i] [b][u]Satchel Charge, Explosive Bag, etc:[/u][/b] [i]weapon_satchel[/i]
As you see, many of them differ from HL1, HL2 and BMS/models/weapons/ directory.
[u]How to bind them:[/u] [i]bind key "use weapon_..."[/i]
[u]Example (my 'BMS/cfg/config.cfg'):[/u]
[i] bind "ESCAPE" "cancelselect" bind "PAUSE" "pause" bind "SHIFT" "+speed" bind "ALT" "+walk" bind "CTRL" "+duck" bind "F3" "askconnect_accept" bind "F5" "jpeg" bind "F6" "save quick" bind "F9" "load quick" bind "MOUSE1" "+attack" bind "MOUSE2" "+attack2" bind "MOUSE4" "use weapon_satchel" bind "MOUSE5" "impulse 100" bind "MWHEELUP" "net_graph 3; cl_showpos 1" bind "MWHEELDOWN" "net_graph 0; cl_showpos 0" cl_battery_dlights "1" cl_dlight_manager_max_fps "45" cl_dlight_manager_min_fps "30" cl_dlight_manager_enable "1" hud_postprocess "1" hud_bloomscale "6" cl_mdldetailfx_enable "1" cl_mdldetailfx_universal_hands "1" cl_mdldetailfx_enable_hands "1" cl_mdldetailfx_blood_time "60" cl_mdldetailfx_slime_time "10" cl_post_process_chromatic_enable "1" cl_post_process_noise_enable "1" cl_post_process_geiger_noise "1" cl_tram_units "1" cl_rumblescale "1.0" cl_debugrumble "0" cl_team "default" cl_class "default" hud_takesshots "0" cl_showhelp "0" cam_snapto "0" cam_ideallag "4.0" cam_idealdelta "4.0" cam_idealyaw "0" cam_idealpitch "0" cam_idealdist "150" cam_collision "1" c_maxpitch "90" c_minpitch "0" c_maxyaw "135" c_minyaw "-135" c_maxdistance "200" c_mindistance "30" c_orthowidth "100" c_orthoheight "100" lookspring "0" lookstrafe "0" joystick "0" m_pitch "0.022" m_filter "0" sensitivity "2.22" m_side "0.8" m_yaw "0.022" m_forward "1" m_customaccel "0" m_customaccel_scale "0.04" m_customaccel_max "0" m_customaccel_exponent "1" m_mouseaccel1 "0" m_mouseaccel2 "0" m_mousespeed "1" cl_mouselook "1" overview_health "1" overview_names "1" overview_tracks "1" overview_locked "1" overview_alpha "1.0" cl_idealpitchscale "0.8" spec_scoreboard "0" cl_spec_mode "1" voice_modenable "1" net_scale "5" net_graphpos "1" net_graphsolid "1" net_graphtext "1" net_graphmsecs "400" net_graphshowlatency "1" net_graphshowinterp "1" net_graph "0" net_graphheight "64" net_graphproportionalfont "1" hud_draw_fixed_reticle "0" cl_chatfilters "31" cc_linger_time "1.0" cc_predisplay_time "0.25" cc_subtitles "0" cc_lang "" g15_update_msec "250" mat_software_aa_strength "0.000000" mat_software_aa_quality "0" mat_software_aa_edge_threshold "1.0" mat_software_aa_blur_one_pixel_lines "0.5" mat_software_aa_tap_offset "1.0" mat_software_aa_strength_vgui "1.000000" cl_playerspraydisable "0" muzzleflash_light "1" cl_npc_speedmod_intime "0.25" cl_npc_speedmod_outtime "1.5" fov_desired "75" cc_pickup_enable "1" cl_bob_disable "0" cl_bobcycle "0.45" cl_bobup "0.5" cl_bob "0.005" cl_bob_vertical_scale "0.2" cl_bob_lateral_scale "0.8" "0.3" r_ambientfactor "5" r_drawmodelstatsoverlaymin "0.1" r_drawmodelstatsoverlaymax "1.5" mp_decals "4096" sv_logsdir "logs" sv_logfile "1" sv_logflush "0" sv_logecho "1" sv_log_onefile "0" sv_logbans "0" sv_voiceenable "1" sv_forcepreload "0" snd_legacy_surround "0" snd_pitchquality "1" volume "1.0" snd_musicvolume "0.100000" snd_mixahead "0.1" adsp_debug "0" snd_ducktovolume "0.55" snd_duckerattacktime "0.5" snd_duckerreleasetime "2.5" snd_duckerthreshold "0.15" dsp_slow_cpu "0" dsp_volume "1.0" dsp_enhance_stereo "1" voice_scale "1" voice_enable "1" voice_forcemicrecord "1" item.title: Weapons naming and binding
item.dc:creator: s0iz
item.description:
Hello folks, not sure if this is the place to post it, so feel free to move it if you think there’s a better place for this contribution (make it a Sticky, maybe?).

So, I don’t know about you but I really like binding weapons to specific keys so I don’t have to be pressing numbers or scrolling in the middle of an encounter.

Problems: weapons names in BMS differ from HL1 and HL2; plus, the names in folder C:/Program Files/Steam/SteamApps/SourceMods/BMS/models/weapons/ also differ from those used in the game (crazy but true).

So here is my little contribution to the community:

Weapons names:

Crowbar: weapon_crowbar
Pistol (9mm): weapon_glock
SMG (9mm): weapon_mp5
Shotgun: weapon_shotgun
Hand grenade: weapon_frag
Missile launcher, RPG or Bazooka: weapon_rpg
Revolver (.357): weapon_357
Gauss, TauCannon, etc: weapon_tau
Hornet Gun, Hive Hand, etc: weapon_hivehand
Gluon Gun, Egon, etc: weapon_gluon
Slam, TripMine, etc: weapon_tripmine
Crossbow, xbow, etc: weapon_crossbow
Satchel Charge, Explosive Bag, etc: weapon_satchel

As you see, many of them differ from HL1, HL2 and BMS/models/weapons/ directory.

How to bind them: bind key “use weapon_…”

Example (my ‘BMS/cfg/config.cfg’):


bind “ESCAPE” “cancelselect”
bind “PAUSE” “pause”
bind “SHIFT” “+speed”
bind “ALT” “+walk”
bind “CTRL” “+duck”
bind “F3” “askconnect_accept”
bind “F5” “jpeg”
bind “F6” “save quick”
bind “F9” “load quick”
bind “MOUSE1” “+attack”
bind “MOUSE2” “+attack2”
bind “MOUSE4” “use weapon_satchel”
bind “MOUSE5” “impulse 100”
bind “MWHEELUP” “net_graph 3; cl_showpos 1”
bind “MWHEELDOWN” “net_graph 0; cl_showpos 0”
cl_battery_dlights “1”
cl_dlight_manager_max_fps “45”
cl_dlight_manager_min_fps “30”
cl_dlight_manager_enable “1”
hud_postprocess “1”
hud_bloomscale “6”
cl_mdldetailfx_enable “1”
